name: GIANT CONSTRICTOR SNAKE

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The snake makes one Bite attack and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.text: Strength Saving Throw: DC 14, one Large or smaller creature the snake can see within 10 feet. Failure: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14). We skirted the coastlines of several islands, sailing south by west until we reached a small peninsula cut off from the main island by a massive stone wall. We were well received by the people of Tanaroa, the small village that guards this wall. The villagers have no name for the large island other than the Isle of
